thread.title: Dreamstate San Francisco Full Lineup Revealed

author: cbs8
title: Dreamstate San Francisco Full Lineup Revealed
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE Insomniac
Insomniac's Dedicated Trance Brand Comes to Bill Graham Civic Auditorium January 16 & 17, 2016
Tickets On Sale Today, October 14 at Noon PT at Insom.co/DreamstateSF_Tix
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --­ Yesterday, Insomniac revealed the full lineup of 16 internationally celebrated artists who will perform at the inaugural Dreamstate San Francisco, the only dedicated trance brand in the United States . Dreamstate will take over the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium on Saturday, January 16 and Sunday, January 17 , with the general tickets on sale beginning today, October 14 at Noon PT HERE . Thousands of trance music lovers will gather together for a weekend filled with positivity and community, the first of its kind in Northern California .
The very first Dreamstate event in Southern California sold out in an astounding four hours. Fans who were unable to acquire tickets to the inaugural event can still be a part of this incredible moment in dance music history. Start planning your Bay Area getaway with the incredible lineup below:
Aly & Fila
Neptune Project
Bryan Kearney
Paul Oakenfold
Cosmic Gate
Paul Van Dyk
Fleming & Lawrence
RAM
Gareth Emery
Sean Tyas
John O'Callaghan
Simon Patterson
Jordan Suckley
Solarstone
Markus Schulz
Vini Vici
Two-day passes will begin at $110 before services and increase as allotments sell out. The premiere Southern California Dreamstate event, taking place November 27-28 at NOS Events Center, sold out in record time and fans are encouraged to get their tickets to the San Francisco edition as soon as possible.
Dreamstate is for fans 18 years and older. For more updates and announcements, please visit www.DreamstateUSA.com and follow on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram .
For more information and to stay up to date with the latest Insomniac news, visit www.insomniac.com .
About Insomniac:
Insomniac produces some of the most innovative, immersive music festivals and events in the world. Enhanced by state-of-the-art lighting, pyrotechnics and sound design, large-scale art installations, theatrical performers and next generation special effects, these events captivate the senses and inspire a unique level of fan interaction. The quality of the experience is the company's top priority.
Throughout its 20-year history, Insomniac has produced more than 250 festivals, concerts and club nights for nearly 5 million attendees in California , Colorado , Florida , Nevada , New York , Texas , Puerto Rico , and the United Kingdom . The company's premier annual event, Electric Daisy Carnival Las Vegas, is the largest multi-day music festival in North America , and attracted more than 400,000 fans over three days in June 2015 .
The company was founded by Pasquale Rotella , and has been based in Los Angeles since it was formed in 1993.
Keep up with Insomniac announcements and news on Insomniac.com , Facebook and Twitter .
